properties.areaDesc: Southeast Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Northwest Pocahontas
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 8 at 2:30AM EST until January 8 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas and
Southeast Randolph Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
